Потому я в нее и ираю
always rush b then is a good game
I like all russian guys who jumps and oneclick me
Kozak giereczka. Tylko trzeba uważać na trust factorp
Gra ugabuga ma dużo, jesli ktoś nie przeczytał to DUUUUUUUUUUUUUŻO cheaterów i ogółem farjerskich smurfów ogółem to nie polecam, ale przychodzę tu się powkurwiać ;)
la verdad que un hermoso juguito me recuerda a mi infancia
toxic community, and valve, fuck your market team for making this game free.
Ive had loads of fun on this game.
Sou suspeito para falar, mas é o melhor jogo do mundo. Amo tudo relacionado a esse game. Parabéns!
wow weri gut game, when i hack is free kills

Игра мусор. Заплатил 1080 рублей за хуйню с которой игра иещется минут 40, даже если найдется, то там будет 5 ебаных пидоров с читами, еще есть сервер крашеры, заходишь в игру и через 2 минуты ты ее проебал, только лишь потому-что ничего не можешь сделать. В общем хуйня, а не игра, лучше в варзон играть, да и вообще стим в пизду катится.
Je to velice dobra hra nejsou zde zadni rusaci. Neni tu zde zadna toxicita. Mam tu hru velice rad :) ♥♥♥
Its fun, good successor to CS1.6

Well.. its a second part of a game ... and as most second parts, it cant reach up to its predecessor. But its still the second part of the game that basicaly started it all. So yeah ... if you never played CS ... do it ..
The game's age is starting to show (get that new source engine already valve) but I definitely still recommend it.
vitun ruma hintti joka keksit  tähän pelii  jotku vitun  bannit nii  tapa ittes vitu haiseva rotta

Parce que c'est un bon jeu de merde
Worst game ever don't get me wrong I love this game but there are to many cheaters RIGHT now i had enough of all the cheaters and i am deleting the game from my pc.
Um jogo mto bom e com uma jogabilidade incrível, infelizmente tem mtos hakcres principalmente nas patentes mais altas mas tirando isso, um dos mlhrs jogos de fps q já joguei.
Jebać gabena jedyna dobra gra to Dota od tego grubasa

CS:GO is a great game, it just needs to fix its anti-cheat, bugs, community, molly spread, bullet registry, map pool, stuttering, fps drops, lags and i repeat stuttering.
Other than that, absolutely playable. :)

this game has great mm when I play with my EU friends.  In NA this game is a cesspool of retards.

Very nice game, too bad creators cannot hold flame and also possibility of cheaters existance. Still best game i know! Cheers!

Csgo is one of those games that you always come back to, it is always fun to play. If you are tierd of competetive csgo have alot of other different games like gun race and hostage. Csgo have also a very big community when it comes to the market place, if you have some skins maybe consider selling or trading.
